10.1. Correlacao da TC original com as demais TC reconstruidas

01 		 TC 08 		 0.9089 	 0.9825 	 0.9871 	 0.9871 	 0.9823 	 0.9758
02 		 TC 09 		 0.9081 	 0.9860 	 0.9873 	 0.9873 	 0.9863 	 0.9797

03 		 TC 13 		 0.9194 	 0.9825 	 0.9873 	 0.9873 	 0.9822 	 0.9759
04 		 TC 14 		 0.9192 	 0.9872 	 0.9880 	 0.9880 	 0.9875 	 0.9810

05 		 TC 19 		 0.9259 	 0.9803 	 0.9851 	 0.9851 	 0.9800 	 0.9739
06 		 TC 20 		 0.9320 	 0.9842 	 0.9851 	 0.9851 	 0.9843 	 0.9782

07 		 TC 41 		 0.9233 	 0.9975 	 0.9986 	 0.9986 	 0.9966 	 0.9906
08 		 TC 42 		 0.9212 	 0.9978 	 0.9988 	 0.9988 	 0.9971 	 0.9910
